Jay Gruden hasn't received any overriding direction from Marvin Lewis on how to run the offense.`` He's the head coach, so whatever vision he has is my vision,'' Jay Gruden said. If he has a vision of running the ball 30 times, then that's going to be the vision. We'll do the best we can to appease him. But there's been no vision that's been told to me right now. It's just come on in here, install your offense and let's make a change. -- Joe Kay Eagles promote two defensive coaches PHILADELPHIA( AP)- The Philadelphia Eagles have promoted Mike Munchak Caldwell to linebackers coach and Michael Vick Zordich to secondary/safeties coach.
